title: Diamond Leaf Pendant - Modern Mangalsutra Centerpiece
features: A delicate leaf-shaped pendant featuring a row of intricately designed leaf motifs, each encrusted with brilliant-cut diamonds. The rose gold setting offers a warm, modern contrast to the sparkling diamonds. The open filigree design creates a light and airy feel. Can be used with chain/mangalsutra.
description: This pendant combines timeless elegance with contemporary design, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The high-quality diamonds and rose gold setting ensure lasting beauty and value. Modern yet sophisticated design. Perfect to wear for any occasion.
